property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your other creatures. If you do, search your deck. You may take an exile creature from your deck, show that exile creature to your opponent and put it into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Katsbhudon, Stand By Me" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever you would draw a card, you may draw 2 cards and discard a card from your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature by a spell effect, they can't choose this one. ■ Whenever a card is discarded from your hand by one of your opponent's spell effects or creature abilities, you may return up to 2 cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You may choose one or more cards from your opponent's graveyard. If you do, your opponent adds those cards to their deck and shuffles it.
